doc:
Edith Taliaferro https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edith_Taliaferro 0 Edith Taliaferro (December 21, 1894 – March 2, 1958) was an American stage and film actress of the late 19th and early 20th centuries. She was active on the stage until 1935 and had roles in three silent films. She is best known for portraying the role of "Rebecca" in the 1910 stage production of Rebecca of Sunnybrook Farm. Edith_Taliaferro ( December_21_,_1894 – March_2_,_1958 ) was an_American_stage_and_film_actress of the_late_19th_and_early_20th_centuries . She was active on the_stage until 1935 and had roles in three_silent_films . She is_best_known for portraying the_role of " Rebecca " in the_1910_stage_production of Rebecca of Sunnybrook_Farm .
